Missing data

Matthew Stephens

September 23, 2017

R Markdown

Imputing missing data

Here we will do a quick comparison with softImpute. First the rank 1 case.

library("flashr")
set.seed(1)
n = 100
p = 500
k = 1
LL = matrix(rnorm(n*k),nrow=n)
FF = matrix(rnorm(p*k),nrow=p)
Y = LL %*% t(FF) + rnorm(n*p)


Ymiss = Y
Ymiss[sample(1:length(Y),length(Y)/2)] = NA
dmiss = flash_set_data(Ymiss)
f = flash_add_factors_from_data(dmiss,K=10)
f = flash_backfit(dmiss,f)

fg = flash_add_greedy(dmiss,10)
## fitting factor/loading 1
## fitting factor/loading 2
fgb = flash_backfit(dmiss,fg)

s = softImpute::softImpute(Ymiss,rank.max=10,type="svd")
## Warning in simpute.svd(x, J, thresh, lambda, maxit, trace.it, warm.start, :
## Convergence not achieved by 100 iterations
index = which(is.na(Ymiss))
s_imp = (s$u %*% diag(s$d) %*% t(s$v))[index]
f_imp = flash_get_lf(f)[index]
fg_imp = flash_get_lf(fg)[index]
fgb_imp = flash_get_lf(fgb)[index]

opt = (LL %*% t(FF))[index]
mean((s_imp-opt)^2)
## [1] 0.5977685
mean((f_imp-opt)^2)
## [1] 0.02654339
mean((fg_imp-opt)^2)
## [1] 0.02654212
mean((fgb_imp-opt)^2)
## [1] 0.02654335
mean(opt^2)
## [1] 0.8789116
flash_get_objective(dmiss,f)
## [1] -36627.52
flash_get_objective(dmiss,fg)
## [1] -36627.52
flash_get_objective(dmiss,fgb)
## [1] -36627.52

Imputing missing data

Here we will do a quick comparison with softImpute.

Now a rank 7 case.

set.seed(1)
n = 100
p = 500
k = 7
LL = matrix(rnorm(n*k),nrow=n)
FF = matrix(rnorm(p*k),nrow=p)
Y = LL %*% t(FF) + rnorm(n*p)


Ymiss = Y
Ymiss[sample(1:length(Y),length(Y)/2)] = NA
dmiss = flash_set_data(Ymiss)
f = flash_add_factors_from_data(dmiss,K=10)
f = flash_backfit(dmiss,f)

fg = flash_add_greedy(dmiss,10)
## fitting factor/loading 1
## fitting factor/loading 2
## fitting factor/loading 3
## fitting factor/loading 4
## fitting factor/loading 5
## fitting factor/loading 6
## fitting factor/loading 7
## fitting factor/loading 8
fgb = flash_backfit(dmiss,fg)

s = softImpute::softImpute(Ymiss,rank.max=10,type="svd")
index = which(is.na(Ymiss))
s_imp = (s$u %*% diag(s$d) %*% t(s$v))[index]
f_imp = flash_get_lf(f)[index]
fg_imp = flash_get_lf(fg)[index]
fgb_imp = flash_get_lf(fgb)[index]

opt = (LL %*% t(FF))[index]
mean((s_imp-opt)^2)
## [1] 0.7290486
mean((f_imp-opt)^2)
## [1] 0.220846
mean((fg_imp-opt)^2)
## [1] 0.6001283
mean((fgb_imp-opt)^2)
## [1] 0.2215198
mean(opt^2)
## [1] 7.873932
